result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ashante Otis Epps

records.addlTxt: from JSC. Filed by Shelby H. arc

2:35 PM  Court Commissioner: Tim Heckmann, Reporter: Unmonitored DAR, Clerk: Benoy   Defendant Ashante Otis Epps in court.  Attorney Aaron Damru in court for State of Wisconsin.  Atty Christopher Wilhelm in court for DE.  INCLUDES: Preliminary hearing for 22CF327 & STC for 20CF828   Atty Wilhem makes statement as to representation for the preliminary hearing.  State calls WI State Trooper Timothy Knutson.  Witness sworn.  State direct.  Witness identifies DE.  Recess: 2:41   Case recalled:  2:46   Same appearances.  Continued direct.  Atty Wilhelm cross.  Witness excused.  Court finds probable cause that a felony was committed and the DF probably committed that felony and binds over for trial. Zoom approved for arraignment if video is enabled.  State is requesting DE test today.  Objection by Atty Wilhelm.  Court reviews bond and will order DE test after the hearing.   Adjourned: 2:55
Arraignment scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Preliminary hearing on October 12, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

11:34 AM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Christopher Wilhelm in court for Ashante Otis Epps. Defendant Ashante Otis Epps not in court-excused. Includes 20CF828 and 22CF327.  Court reviews case. Atty Wilhelm requests to set PH. Atty Wilhelm waives prelim time limits. Court sets PH with Court Commissioner in case 22CF327 and STC in 20CF828. Adjourned 11:48 AM
Status conference on September 9, 2022 at 11:45 am.

11:34 AM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Lindabaur. Prosecuting attorney Holly Elkin Rockow in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Ashante Otis Epps in court.  Attorney Christopher Wilhelm in court for Ashante Otis Epps. Includes 20CF828 and 22CF327. Court reviews files. Atty Wilhelm states matters are not resolved and requests preliminary hearings. Atty Wilhelm only represents in 20CF828. DE to contact PD to see if he qualifies for 22CF327 and also given court appointed paperwork. If DE files PFAC- Court will appoint Atty Wilhelm. DE confirms address and phone number. Court sets STC via Zoom and will excuse DE from appearing, as it will be for scheduling only. Adjourned at 11:40 AM.  gll
Status conference scheduled for September 9, 2022 at 11:45 am.
Status conference on August 18, 2022 at 11:30 am.

2:31 PM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: K. Anderson, Attorney Alec Ballo in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Christopher Wilhelm appeared by video for Ashante Otis Epps, Defendant Ashante Otis Epps not in court.  INCLUDES 20CF828 and 22CF327. Set for PTC.  Atty. Wilhelm states that he will be meeting with DE early next week, requests additional hearing. Court issues warrant - STAYED until 8/18 @ 11:30 AM. Adjourned: 2:33 PM. kma
Status conference scheduled for August 18, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Status conference on July 13, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

08:36 AM  Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, ADA: Michael Joseph Becker, DF ATTY: Christopher Wilhelm, not yet retained on this case, retained on 20CF828- Branch II case, DF: Ashante Otis Epps appeared.  Atty Wilhelm states there is a Global Offer with Branch II file.  ADA Becker confirms.  Court notes this has not had a PH at this time, court will schedule next matter in Branch II.  Court will quash authorized warrant.  DE verified address and phone number.  Bond continues. Adjourned at 8:46 AM. bph .  Status conference scheduled for July 13, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Return on warrant on June 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.

01:40 PM  Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, ADA: Michael Joseph Becker, NONA by def.  Includes 22CF327 & 22TR1374.  Court reviews files and notes Atty Wilhelm represents DE on 20CF828 (only) in Branch II.  Court authorizes warrant- STAYED until 6/9/22, if DE appears in Branch II for PTC scheduled at 8:30, DE to appear in Branch III to address this matter.  If DE does not appear, warrant will be issued, Extraditable from Adjoining States.  Court defaults 22TR1374.  NC/GNC, F/F $200.50, 30 Day DL Suspension and 30 DTP. Adjourned. bph  Return on warrant scheduled for June 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.

for PH to be set as STC today at 1:30 PM. Filed by ADA Becker. arc    Per SRN, Ck w/ Atty Chris Wilhelm - if he was being retained on this file - if he is, prelim will proceed, if not, we'll do a status conf.  Per Atty Whilhelm, he is NOT representing Def in this matter. arc
Preliminary hearing on June 3, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

01:33 PM  Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Lindabaur. ADA:  Erica Ellenwood   DF ATTY:  Christopher Wilhelm in 20CF828 only  DF:  Ashante Otis Epps did not appear. Includes 22CF327, 22TR1374, and 20CF828. Includes Atty Wilhelm states he only represents in 20CF828. Court issues body only warrant extraditable adjoining states in 22CF327.  Recalled at 1:46. Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Lindabaur. ADA:  Erica Ellenwood Court defaults 22TR1374, NC, guilty F/F $200.50. 30 DTP.  Recalled at 2:00 PM. DF:  Ashante Otis Epps appeared. All other appearances as previously stated. Court VACATES warrant in 22CF327 and default in 22TR1374 and QUASHES WARRANT in 20CF828. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights in 22CF327. Defendant understands. DE confirms address and DOB. Waive reading. Bond argument; bond ordered. Court questions non-appearance in 20CF828. Defendant was late to previous hearing before Branch 2. Attys and DE to schedule prelim/STC in 22CF327 and 22TR1374 before Branch 3 and hearing in 20CF828 before Branch 2.  Off record: Court enters NG plea in 22TR1374- to trail 22CF327.  gll

Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.
